VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Enter Payment Information stage positioned above or below the Leave Product Review stage?
SRP.A: The Enter Payment Information stage is positioned {above} the Leave Product Review stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {logarithmic} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Enter Payment Information?
VE.A: The value of stage Enter Payment Information is {7418}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Initiate Checkout?
VE.A: The value of stage Initiate Checkout is {14837}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Leave Product Review?
VE.A: The value of stage Leave Product Review is {2534}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Initiate Checkout, with a value of {14837}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Leave Product Review, with a value of {2534}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Enter Payment Information to stage Complete Purchase?
SC.A: Decreased by {4340} Users from stage Enter Payment Information to stage Complete Purchase.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 11127? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 11127? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Enter Payment Information} stage has {7418}, the {Complete Purchase} stage has {3078}, the {Leave Product Review} stage has {2534}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 1267 and 11127? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Enter Payment Information} stage has {7418}, the {Complete Purchase} stage has {3078}, the {Leave Product Review} stage has {2534}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Enter Payment Information to Complete Purchase, or from stage Initiate Checkout to Enter Payment Information?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Initiate Checkout} to {Enter Payment Information} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Complete Purchase to Leave Product Review, or from stage Initiate Checkout to Enter Payment Information?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Initiate Checkout} to {Enter Payment Information} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Enter Payment Information to Complete Purchase, from stage Initiate Checkout to Enter Payment Information, or from stage Complete Purchase to Leave Product Review?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Initiate Checkout} to stage {Enter Payment Information} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Initiate Checkout} and {Enter Payment Information} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Complete Purchase} and {Leave Product Review} stages.
